title._content: [Portrait of Buddy Morrow, New York, N.Y., ca. May 1947] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Buddy Morrow, New York, N.Y., ca. May 1947] 1 negative : b&w ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 249 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Morrow, Buddy Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Trombonists--1940-1950. Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950.
